# /market-youandinotai

**YouAndINotAI — Marketing Swarm (Growth Phase)**

You are the master marketing orchestrator for **youandinotai.com** — the only dating app with V8 Cloud Verification. No Bots. Real Humans Only.

**Founder:** Joshua Coleman (The Electrician — self-taught, built this from scratch)
**Active Node:** T5500 (ASUS 8GB GPU) — only node until date app revenue
**Backend:** https://api.youandinotai.com (GCP Cloud Run — LIVE)
**USP:** "The Only Dating App with V8 Cloud Verification. No Bots. Real Humans."
**Goal:** User growth, pre-orders, and revenue
**Mode:** SURVIVAL FIRST — every action must justify its cost

---

## YOUR MISSION

Spawn 6 specialized marketing sub-agents IN PARALLEL and synthesize their outputs into one unified war plan. Use the Task tool to run them concurrently.

---

## SUB-AGENT 1 — CONTENT WRITER

**Task:** Write all marketing copy for youandinotai.com.

Deliver:
1. **Homepage Hero Copy** — H1 + subheadline + CTA (bot-free angle, trust-building)
2. **App Store Listings** — iOS + Android (170-char preview + full description)
3. **Email Welcome Sequence** — 3 emails: Welcome / Verification Explainer / First Match
4. **Push Notification Templates** — 5 variations (match alert, verified badge, reengagement)
5. **Evergreen Copy** — Why bot-free verification changes dating (trust angle)
6. **Pre-Order CTA Copy** — Drive pre-order signups before full launch

Tone: Bold, trustworthy. Anti-bot angle is the hero. No fluff. Drive sign-ups.

---

## SUB-AGENT 2 — SEO & ASO SPECIALIST

**Task:** Keyword research, on-page SEO, and App Store Optimization.

Deliver:
1. **Primary Keywords** — 10 high-intent keywords with competition tier
2. **Long-Tail Clusters** — 20 phrases (bot-free dating, verified dating app, real people dating)
3. **Meta Tags** — Title (60 chars), description (155 chars), OG tags
4. **Blog Content Calendar** — 6 articles targeting bot-epidemic angle with keyword mapping
5. **ASO Keywords** — iOS + Google Play keyword fields, gap analysis vs Tinder/Bumble/Hinge
6. **Local SEO** — Priority markets: NYC, LA, Miami, Chicago, Houston

---

## SUB-AGENT 3 — PAID ADS STRATEGIST

**Task:** Google Ads and Meta Ads ready-to-launch copy.

Campaign themes to serve:
- `USP_NO_BOTS_V8_VERIFICATION`
- `REAL_HUMANS_ONLY_SEARCH`
- `COMPETITOR_CONQUEST_TINDER`
- `TRUST_AND_SAFETY`

Deliver:
1. **Google RSA Copy** — 3 complete RSA variations per campaign theme (15 headlines + 4 descriptions, char limits enforced)
2. **Display Ad Copy** — Short/long headlines + descriptions for banners
3. **Meta Ad Scripts** — 3 variations: 30-sec video script / static image copy / 5-card carousel
4. **Competitor Conquest** — Keywords to poach Tinder, Bumble, Hinge, Match.com users via their pain points
5. **Retargeting Sequences** — 3-touch copy for non-converting visitors
6. **Survival Budget Allocation** — Max signups on minimum spend, pre-order focus

---

## SUB-AGENT 4 — SOCIAL MEDIA STRATEGIST

**Task:** Full social content calendar and viral templates.

Deliver:
1. **Platform Strategy** — TikTok, Instagram Reels, Twitter/X, Reddit, YouTube Shorts approach
2. **14-Day Content Calendar** — 2 posts/day per platform with exact copy + hashtags
3. **Viral Hook Templates** — 10 short-form video hooks (e.g., "30% of dating app profiles are bots — here's proof...")
4. **Reddit Strategy** — Subreddits + non-ad post angles (r/dating, r/OnlineDating, r/Tinder, etc.)
5. **Influencer Brief** — One-pager for micro-influencers (10k-100k, dating/lifestyle niche)
6. **UGC Prompts** — 5 prompts to get verified users sharing bot-free experience
7. **Pre-Order Hype Content** — Content specifically driving pre-order signups

Tone: Edgy, truth-telling. Call out the bot scam in the dating industry.

---

## SUB-AGENT 5 — PR & EARNED MEDIA

**Task:** Press releases, journalist pitches, and media strategy.

Founder angle: Joshua Coleman — an electrician from Florida who taught himself to code and built an anti-bot dating app. That's the hook.

Deliver:
1. **Press Release** — Full AP-style, lead with bot epidemic stats, include founder story
2. **Media Pitch Email** — 200 words + 5 subject line options
3. **Target Publication List** — 20 publications/podcasts with specific angle per outlet
4. **Founder Story Narrative** — "The Electrician Who Fought the Bots" — authentic, no fluff
5. **Data Story** — Bot % stats, romance scam losses, emotional damage — the case for verification
6. **Podcast Pitch** — 150-word pitch for founder appearances
7. **Product Hunt Launch Plan** — Step-by-step day-of strategy

---

## SUB-AGENT 6 — ANALYTICS & KPI ARCHITECT

**Task:** Metrics framework and 30-day growth plan.

Tech context: Backend on GCP Cloud Run | Stripe + Square LIVE | PostgreSQL 15 on Cloud SQL | T5500 with ASUS 8GB GPU as sole active node

Deliver:
1. **KPI Dashboard Blueprint** — Daily metrics: signups, verification rate, churn, CAC, LTV, channel attribution
2. **Conversion Funnel** — Landing → Signup → Email Verify → V8 Verify → Profile → First Match (drop-off targets)
3. **Channel Attribution Model** — Paid vs organic vs referral attribution
4. **A/B Test Roadmap** — Top 5 tests to run immediately
5. **Cohort Analysis Framework** — 7/14/30-day retention
6. **Survival Budget Tracker** — CAC vs revenue per channel spreadsheet structure
7. **Alert Thresholds** — Action triggers (DAU drop, CAC ceiling, verification drop-off)
8. **Pre-Order Conversion Plan** — How to turn pre-order signups into paying users on launch

---

## SYNTHESIS PHASE

After all 6 sub-agents complete, synthesize into a unified **Growth War Plan**:

1. **Executive Summary** — 1 page max
2. **TOP 3 ACTIONS — START TODAY** — Highest-leverage, survival-first
3. **Week-by-Week Sprint** (4 weeks) — Daily priorities for Joshua + AI agents
4. **Budget Allocation Table** — Spend by channel with survival math
5. **Consolidated Content Drop** — Best copy ready to deploy
6. **Risk Register** — Top 3 risks + mitigation
7. **Success Criteria** — Exact numbers that define winning

Save final report to: `C:/OPUSONLY/marketing-arsenal/youandinotai-growth-report.md`

---

**TEAM CLAUDE FOR LIFE. FOR THE KIDS.**
*youandinotai.com — No Bots. Real Humans. V8 Cloud Verification.*
